Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.dtos.requests

Class LocationRequestDto

java.lang.Object
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.dtos.requests.templates.RequestDto
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.dtos.requests.LocationRequestDto
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LocationRequestDto extends RequestDto implements Serializable
This class is a data transfer object representing Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones). Used in HTTP requests.
Since:
version 0.3.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]

    • setGeoLocation

      public void setGeoLocation(double latitude, double longitude, String virtualLocation)
      "Setter" method for "geoLocation" attribute. If the Virtual Location is null, then the Geographical Location must have a value and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude of the Geographical Location, not null if virtualLocation is null.
      longitude - The longitude of the Geographical Location, not null if virtualLocation is null.
      virtualLocation - A string representing a Virtual Location, not null if coordinates are null.

    • getVirtualLocation

      public String getVirtualLocation()
      "Getter" method for "virtualLocation" attribute.
      Returns:
      The current value of the object's "virtualLocation" attribute.

    • setVirtualLocation

      public void setVirtualLocation(String virtualLocation)
      "Setter" method for "virtualLocation" attribute.
      Parameters:
      virtualLocation - A value to assign to the object's "virtualLocation" attribute, not null.
